original_text: The lion did tear in pieces enough for his whelps, and strangled for his lionesses, and filled his holes with prey, and his dens with ravin.
korean_text: 수사자가 그 새끼를 위하여 먹이를 충분히 찢고 그의 암사자들을 위하여 움켜 사냥한 것으로 그 굴을 채웠고 찢은 것으로 그 구멍을 채웠었도다

sentences.original_text: The lion did tear in pieces enough for his whelps
sentences.korean_translation: 사자는 그의 새끼들을 위해 충분히 찢어 조각내었고

sentences.original_text: and filled his holes with prey
